programme.title: Survivor 49
programme.desc: A new group of castaways begin the adventure of a lifetime while stranded on the stunning islands of Fiji. The players competing on the 49th season include a musician, a correctional officer, an MBA career coach, an airport ramp agent, a fitness trainer, a financial crime consultant, a clinical social worker and a film producer.

programme.title: Talking Point

programme.title: Lingo S4
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen
programme.desc: Popular chef Rachel Khoo now lives in the Swedish countryside in a charming, traditional wooden house that serves as her base for the series. In every episode, she meets up with local food producers or a Swedish chef and visits stores and restaurants that focus on Swedish craftsmanship. Then it's back home to the kitchen, where she puts her twist on local recipes, preparing delicious, healthy food that's easy for anyone to cook at home.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Each episode of this cooking competition begins at the scene of the crime -- a kitchen that was just used to make an amazing, mouthwatering dessert that has since disappeared. To take the $100,000 prize, the competing dessert makers will need to prove they have the technical know-how, imagination and problem-solving skills needed to decode and re-create incredible desserts and cakes from across the world.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Everyone is going green today on CLUB M.A.G.I.C! Didi brings her own lunchbox and water tumbler so that she does not have a takeaway box or plastic bottle to throw away, Ling makes creative art pieces with recycled materials and Sham has his own way of going green. Instead of driving, he walks, cycles or runs to his destination. Miss P tells her agents that she has her own garden to add some greenery to the environment! The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'p' and the words featured are pail, peach and peas.

programme.desc: Farmer Haywire's 5-feeder tap is broken, Numbersquad rushes to help, while farmer haywire fixes the tap. Mr Mengo needs help to get the gnomes into 4 teams, with 5 players in each for the Gnomeball tournament.

programme.title: Pokemon Horizons: Season 2 -The Search for Laqua
programme.desc: In order to learn and master Terastallization, Liko, Roy, and Dot have joined the Naranja Academy's "Tera Training"! They meet Clavell, the school's director, and Geeta, the chairwoman of Paldea's Pokmon League as well as the Elite Four of Paldea: Rika, Poppy, Larry , and Hassel. And so begins their adventure in Paldea Region, setting their sights on their Terastallization debut!

programme.desc: In the Amazon, Peyo discovers Black Caiman eggs but its mother no where to be found, leading Leo, Katie and Hero to join Peyo as they find and help the mother Black Caiman get back to its eggs.

programme.title: Groom My Room S11
programme.desc: 9-year old Sarah is fed up with the faded pink walls in her room and wants to transform her place into a magical underwater world with colourful fish and an enchanting mermaid. Joining her on this daring adventure is host Charmian Tan and her Groom My Room posse. Together they will try to stay afloat and achieve the impossible within 48 hours, with a budget of S$1.500 plus the help of two carefully chosen lifelines.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys - Series 7
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels through Europe to understand life during the First and Second World Wars. On his travels, he visits Spain, France, Germany, Italy, Sweden, Austria and the Czech Republic, learning about the old empires of Europe swept away by revolution and a dozen new nations that embarked optimistically upon independence.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Press Your Luck S2
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. programme.desc: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

programme.title: Incredible Tales S7
programme.desc: A newlywed couple, go to Vietnam for their honeymoon. They bring back an unusual souvenir from their vacation. A souvenir that was meant, not only to be a souvenir' but a purchase that was made, to also support an art form. However, this intriguing souvenir turns into a total nightmare. The souvenir not only occupies a decorative spot in the house but intrudes into the young couple's marriage. Strange things begin to happen, affecting both the husband and the wife.

programme.desc: 王七拿住阿麦，口无遮拦提及父母。阿麦暴怒，挣脱钳制与王七打作一团，被巡防营带去见商易之决断。私自离营本是死罪，徐静安抚商易之，将此事交由他来审断。王七要求商易之不能徇私枉法，否则全军不服。阿麦则在无关人等退出后才说出自己是去寻找敌军大营，加之唐绍义作证，王七震惊不已。徐静赏罚分明，阿麦私自离营死罪可免，罚禁闭三日，另有与王七斗殴，各罚数杖。王七与阿麦认罚。阿麦毫无骨气地趴在凳子上，一边挨打一边喊疼，王七掩面深觉丢人。挨完打，王七主动伸手求和，认为阿麦有资格做战友。.

programme.title: 阿贤这么吃 S2
programme.desc: 《阿贤这么吃2 》走入庄园探寻马来西亚产制优质食材，看看各路生产者如何深耕在地物产，从咖啡、牛奶、鱼肉、蔬菜、鸡肉、发酵物到食用菌菇，还有我们刻板印象中唯有欧洲产才属优质品的起司、无花果、鱼子酱与巧克力等等，都将全然是马来西亚在地风土孕育的物产。阿贤也请教餐厅主厨如何将多元多样的风土食材，烹制成日常餐桌上的美味风景线，让土地与餐桌产生紧密连结，且透过不停梳理、复刻与重现，形塑马来西亚饮食的新在地。.

programme.title: 在世界的角落扎营

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 2025 S2
programme.desc: 年过半百的乐龄人士，在为家庭和事业奉献多年后，终于迎来了人生的新篇章。那些藏在心底的梦想，如今将再次点亮舞台！《黄金年华》除了是一场歌艺竞赛，对参赛者来说更是一段难得的学习之旅。参赛者不仅能拜师学艺，也能交到志同道合的朋友。大家在一起展现真我、切磋技艺，以歌会友，让生活更喜乐安康。新系列的节目将延续团战的形式，为乐龄朋友们提供一个更多元、更有趣的荣誉舞台，让大家拥有同样的机会，携手走到最后。.

programme.title: 怪宿宿

programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 开门见山
programme.desc: 下一站，艺人们抵达马来西亚武吉丁宜，入住可饱览群山美景的别墅，由吴俐璇热情做东,她带大家品尝地道美食、在田野间玩天然玩具，欢乐不断。随后众人兵分两路，一组硬闯布满水蛭的山路，一组挑战水深及腰的朔溪。惊险与笑声交织，这趟旅程随时把他们推向极限！.

programme.title: 你好，再见
programme.desc: 火焱与水淼共处化疗区，火药味十足，却因一张旧钞，让火焱震惊发现水淼竟是幼时救他的贵人。夏桐遇前男友和小三，耀麟假扮追求者解围，两人感情似乎升温。瑾美晕倒，父母才发现她患癌。她偶遇旧日暗恋对象刘天禹，两人擦肩而过，却心生波澜。火焱感谢夏桐揭发 Brandon，送手链表达谢意。夏桐归还手链时却撞见他被公司狼狈驱逐…….

programme.title: 港女野人奇遇记
programme.desc: 新西兰因为有很多外来物种，因为它们没有天敌导致一度过量繁殖，扰乱了生态，所以当地政府容许打猎，希望可以保育生态。 4位港女野人何泳芍(Honey)、胡美贻(Nicole)、廖慧仪(Jessica)和陈若思(Amber)在跟全职猎人Pete学习了基本猎人守则后，便要决定谁会在第二天跟Pete上山打猎。.

programme.title: 天行健
programme.desc: 晚清末年，社会动荡，净坛密藏宝图失窃，各方势力争夺。曾为御前侍卫的门三刀受命追回宝图，揭露幕后黑手。天津大沽县发生命案，九名死者由融天岭门人所杀，县衙捕快王地保独自追查凶手。与此同时，融天岭掌门卓不凡与淇亲王密谋联手夺宝，图谋利用宝藏来实现各自目的。三人不约而同前往上海，却无意间卷入一场波澜壮阔的历史风波。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 常钰青判断南夏军会在野狼沟设伏，陈起却并未采纳，换了傅冲为前锋。常钰青不甘受冷待，带着兄弟崔衍与自己的兵绕开野狼沟直奔豫州。石达春为保护百姓投降，却遭到百姓唾骂。城中特使慌忙向外传讯豫州通敌，却被石达春假借北漠人之手解决。另一边，北漠前锋骑兵果然在野狼沟遇伏，在南夏军鞭箭队手中损失惨重。两军步兵陷入混战，陈起亮出帅旗。阿麦见旗如见仇人，热血冲头挥刀向那边冲杀，打乱己方阵型。徐静看出异常，要派遣督战队去解决，商易之认出那人正是阿麦，急忙阻拦。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.

programme.desc: 以本地的社会时事为骨架，描述同一个邻里几个不同背景的家庭，如何由冷漠自我，到最终了解何谓"爱"。故事反映了血浓于水、守望相助、远亲不如近邻的可贵精神。新传媒艺人黄文永在此剧中饰演父亲，是一家咖啡店的老板，为人节俭，有三个女儿，分别由林湘萍、李心钰和蔡佩璇饰演，而陈丽萍则饰演文永的妻子。.
